doc.title: Patron Saints
doc.plot: When the City of New Orleans suffered its darkest days following Hurricane Katrina, the New Orleans saints, "lovable losers" for 40 years, gave fans something to believe in. Patron Saints follows the players, team and league executives and the fans as they rallied to help bring the city and the people back from ruin as the team made an improbable and miraculous run to the NFC Championship Game.
